item.title: The Best Way to Improve Software Quality
item.description: A few years ago I was working on a team that owned a web app for our enterprise customers. It had been forked from our original app specifically to meet the needs of larger clients. Despite both apps' shared heritage, they were not similarly reliable. My team’s app build almost never failed, yet the original app build was red a third of the time. Since a red build prevented new deployments of the app, it slowed a lot of people down.
